thread.title: Watch DeMarcus Cousins pick up his first technical foul with the Pelicans
thread.title_full: Watch DeMarcus Cousins pick up his first technical foul with the Pelicans

title: Watch DeMarcus Cousins pick up his first technical foul with the Pelicans
text:
Feb 26, 2017 at 8:34p ET 0Shares 
It didn’t take long for DeMarcus Cousins to revert to his old ways. After going two games with no technical fouls, the New Orleans Pelicans’ volatile All-Star was assessed his first technical foul with his new team when he and Thunder center Steven Adams, who was also T’d up, got tangled up just 32 seconds into Sunday’s game. Took 32 seconds for Boogie to receive another technical foul. 
He will be suspended a game unless this is rescinded. pic.twitter.com/4rbcYHRfE1 
— Bleacher Report (@BleacherReport) February 27, 2017 
Cousins was suspended one game earlier this month after picking up his 16th technical of the season. If Sunday night’s technical isn’t rescinded, Cousins will be forced to sit out another game. 
Cousins is no stranger to drawing the ire of the refs during his career, picking up 109 technicals and being ejected 11 times before Sunday’s game.
